title: Grid Curtailment Event Analysis
description: A solar farm was curtailed by the grid operator. An analyst needs to verify the reason and calculate the financial impact.

tasks.description: Retrieve the curtailment order details from the ISO/RTO portal, including the reason code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the curtailment was due to 'Local Congestion'.

tasks.description: Calculate the amount of lost generation by comparing actual output to the potential generation during the curtailment period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates that 50 MWh of generation was lost.

tasks.description: Calculate the lost revenue based on the spot price of electricity at the time of the curtailment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the financial impact was $2,500.
